alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; New Kent; Western King William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Kent, east central Henrico, southeastern Hanover and west central King William Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highland Springs, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mechanicsville, Highland Springs, Studley, Tunstall, East Highland Park, Bottoms Bridge, Orapax Farms, Elko, Montrose, Sandston, Glendale, Westwood, Richmond International and Fair Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; New Kent; Western King William
